content:
There are no Russian warships in the Black and Azov Seas.

About thisreportedNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There are two enemy ships in the Mediterranean, including one carpet carrier carpet, a total volley of up to 8 rockets.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, 23 vessels were passed by the Kerch Strait to the Azov Sea, 8 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait.

12 vessels to the Black Sea, 4 of them continued in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait.

"The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas), turning off automatic identification systems (AIS)," the Navy emphasized.

Honnery ships have been in places for a long time and do not go for combat duty after a number of lost ships.

Earlier the Navy spokesman Captain 3 rank Dmitry PletenchuktoldWhat ships in the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation are currently the most dangerous for Ukraine and, accordingly, can be a priority for the Defense Forces of Ukraine.
title: The enemy continues to bury his ships in the Black and Azov Seas
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Mediterranean are ...
author: Army Inform
